title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Peyote Plants and the Sasquatch Outfit Return
content:
The psychoactive plants with special shapeshifting powers have returned. After your first peyote trip, wait for the cover of fog and nightfall to eat a special Peyote Plant in the hills above Grapeseed and morph into the elusive Sasquatch.

Playing GTA Online this week will also get the Sasquatch Outfit added to your wardrobe, so you can become an object of endless fascination for Southern San Andreas locals anytime you like.
